title: Wes Craven's Summer of Fear | FULL MOVIE | 1978 | Horror, Linda Blair

sources.title: Wes Craven's Summer of Fear | FULL MOVIE | 1978 | Horror, Linda Blair
sources.description:
A teenage girl's life is turned upside down after her cousin moves into her house, and as time goes by, she begins to suspect that she may be a practitioner of witchcraft.

Directed by Wes Craven
Starring Linda Blair, Lee Purcell, Jeremy Slate
1978

Edited for YouTube ad standards
